title: Graph of Function - Modeling Depth of Water

content.question:
Moving from left to right

The curve begins at approximately point (0 comma 2).

The curve trends up gradually to point (3 comma 3) and then to point (6 comma 4).

At the point (6 comma 4), the curve trends down gradually and passes through the following points with approximate coordinates:

(9 comma 3.7)

(12 comma 2.5)

(15 comma 0.5)

(18 comma 1)

At the point (18 comma 1), the curve trends up gradually and passes through the following points with approximate coordinates:

(21 comma 1.5)

(24 comma 2.5)

(27 comma 4.3)

(30 comma 7)

The curve ends at approximately point (30 comma 7).

The depth of water, in feet, at a certain place in a lake is modeled by a function <math alttext="W"><semantics><mi>W</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. The graph of <math alttext="y equals W open parentheses t close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>W</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is shown for <math alttext="0 less or equal than t less or equal than 30"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is the number of days since the first day of a month. What are all intervals of <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on which the depth of water is increasing at a decreasing rate?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open parentheses 0 , 3 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mn>0,3</mn></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 18 , 30 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mn>18,30</mn></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> only

​<math alttext="open parentheses 0 , 6 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mn>0,6</mn></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 18 , 30 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mn>18,30</mn></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
